thread.title: Hyundai sales up 5% in July
thread.title_full: Hyundai sales up 5% in July | The Financial Express

author: financialexpress.com
title: Hyundai sales up 5% in July
text:
Other Articles Andhra Pradesh government sanctions 2 lakh houses for rural poor Toyota Kirloskar sales decline 1% in July Maruti Suzuki picks up pace, sales grow 20% in July Hyundai Motor India Ltd (HMIL) today reported 5 per cent increase in total sales at 50,408 units in July.
The company had sold 48,014 units in the same month last year, HMIL said in a statement.
In the domestic market, Hyundai sold 36,500 units last month as compared with 29,275 units in July 2014, up 24.7 per cent.
However, the companyâ€™s exports declined 25.8 per cent to 13,908 units as against 18,739 units in the same period last year.
First Published on August 01, 2015 4:05 pm
